alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Marion (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 30 at 12:13AM CST until November 30 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Fayette, Lamar and Marion. * WHEN...Until 315 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1213 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Winfield, Fayette, Vernon, Sulligent, Millport, Glen Allen, Kennedy, Belk, Beaverton, Gu-Win, Blooming Grove, Bluff, Lamar County Airport, Crews, Bedford, Crossville, Cody, Hightogy, Wayside and Bevill State College Fayette.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
